Journal.Title: Zhongguo Zhong yao za zhi = Zhongguo zhongyao zazhi = China journal of Chinese materia medica

Article.ArticleTitle: [Studies on original plant of traditional Chinese drug "bai zhi" (radix Angelicae Dahuricae) and its closely related wild plants. III. Comparison of coumarins of "bai zhi" with those of closely related wild plants].

AbstractText: To provide chemical data for confirming the original plant of traditional Chinese drug "Bai Zhi".
Coumarins of 4 cultivated breeds of "Bai Zhi" and 3 closely related wild plants, together with other 2 Angelica plants were compared by HPLC.

According to coumarin patterns, 4 cultivated breeds of "Bai Zhi" and 3 closely related wild plants could be divided into 3 groups: 1. 4 cultivated breeds of "Bai Zhi" ("Chuan Bai Zhi", "Hang Bai Zhi", "Qi Bai Zhi" and "Yu Bai Zhi") and Angelica dahurica var. formosana; 2. A. dahurica; 3. A. porphyrocaulis.
In point of the coumarin components, A. dahurica var. formosana is closer to traditional Chinese drug "Bai Zhi" than the others.
